sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-name',
  templateUrl: './name.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./name.component.scss'],
})
export class NameComponent {
  name = '';
  namePattern = '^[a-zA-Z ]*$';
}
<input
  class="mb-6"
  placeholder="-Type here-"
  type="text"
  [(ngModel)]="name"
  #nameInput="ngModel"
  [pattern]="namePattern"
  required
/>
<button
  (click)="nextPage()"
  [disabled]="nameInput.errors"
  pattern="[a-zA-Z]+"
  class="btn"
>
  Next
</button>
